eu.europa.esig.dss.token.mocca

Class MOCCASignatureTokenConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.europa.esig.dss.token.mocca.MOCCASignatureTokenConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MOCCASignatureTokenConnection
extends Object
implements SignatureTokenConnection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MOCCASignatureTokenConnection(PasswordInputCallback callback)
      Use this constructor when the signature algorithm is not known before the connection is opened.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MOCCASignatureTokenConnection

        public MOCCASignatureTokenConnection(PasswordInputCallback callback)
        Use this constructor when the signature algorithm is not known before the connection is opened. You must set the SignatureAlgorithm property of the key after the connection has been opened (you can get the SignatureAlgorithm name from the key)
        Parameters:
        callback - provides the PIN

        public List<DSSPrivateKeyEntry> getKeys()
                                 throws DSSException
        Description copied from interface: SignatureTokenConnection
        Retrieves all the available keys (private keys entries) from the token.
        Specified by:
        getKeys in interface SignatureTokenConnection
        Returns:
        List of encapsulated private keys
        Throws:
        DSSException - If there is any problem during the retrieval process

      • sign

        public SignatureValue sign(ToBeSigned toBeSigned,
                           DigestAlgorithm digestAlgorithm,
                           DSSPrivateKeyEntry keyEntry)
                    throws DSSException
        Description copied from interface: SignatureTokenConnection
        This method signs the toBeSigned data with the digest digestAlgorithm and the given keyEntry.
        Specified by:
        sign in interface SignatureTokenConnection
        Parameters:
        toBeSigned - The data that need to be signed
        digestAlgorithm - The digest algorithm to be used before signing
        keyEntry - The private key to be used
        Returns:
        the signature value representation with the used algorithm and the binary value
        Throws:
        DSSException - If there is any problem during the signature process
